attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THAT THE EX PRIME MINISTER BE BROUGHT TO ACCOUNT FOR HIS RUNNING OF OUR COUNTRY, BRING IT TOO ITS KNEES WHILE HE SWANNED OFF AS NOTHING HAS HAPPENED, LET ALONE OWNING UP TO ALL HIS LIES AND DECEIT WHILE IN POWER
FURTHER TO SHOW ALL HIS FINANCIAL  DEALINGS/RECEIPTS CLAIMED WHILE IN POWER.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
